channel.title: 317 pvp problem-Under control-
channel.description: I got a Blank 317 and when i got out of lumbridge any player can attack me... :eek: I even tried it myself with my brother and he can attack me when im out side of lumbridge How can I make everything non pvp except in wild..... :( :( Ok I got it under control
